question: ي شباب أحد عنده previous test 2 لل matlab
I'm urgently looking for 5 pax of Interns in MRCSB Melaka for Measurement Department
answer: Job Scope Includes: 1)To assist Measurement Department for site and office related tasks 2)To assist Engineers in planning Preventive Maintenance and Reactive Maintenance 3)To assist Engineers in Process Analyzers Data correlation with Lab Data 4)To assist Engineers in Budgetary and CAPEX Document preparation 5)To assist Engineers in Project Execution 6)To assist Engineers in Preventive Maintenance Works in Plant Turn Around and Shut Down. 7)To proactively seeking tasks and provide support to Measurement Department members 8)To assist Documentation works such as information collection, communicate with different departments etc 9)To prepare Measurement Instruments Database such as datasheet, Engineering Drawings etc 10)To prepare Measurement Instruments presentation and slides 11)Willing to work extra hours if needed and able to work in Melaka 12) Proactive and Independent candidate is preferred 13) Minimum CGPA 3.0 and minimum duration 12 weeks and above 14) Degree background in Engineering. Only selected candidates will be contacted. Interested candidates can DM your resume through my Linkedin. Not by email as I do not prefer my inbox to be full of application emails https://www.linkedin.com/in/aizatfarhan1993/

question: Assalamualaikum and Greetings to all, we are glad to invite you to a Career Talk & Internship Placement Opportunities by Texas Instruments Malaysia Sdn. Bhd.
answer: 17th December 2019 | Tuesday | Block V01, Faculty of Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Johor Bahru. PLEASE BRING ALONG YOUR CURRICULUM VITAE (CV) AND WEAR OFFICE ATTIRE FOR INTERVIEW SESSION. question: عندي استفسار شباب يعطيكم العافية من ناحية التسجيل في السمستر الجاي لانه راح يكون اول سمستر لي بالكلية هل ضروري حضوري في بداية التسجيل تاريخ ٦/٢/٢٠٢ او مافي مشكلة اذا تأخرت لين ١١/٢/٢٠٢٠ او اذا مسموح لي اخلي احد يسجلني وانا مو موجود ؟
answer: على حد علمي حركة انه واحد يسجلك وانت مو موجود ماتزبط. لانه قد جربت اسويها وما زبطت. مع انه الادفايزر كان معطيني خطاب.
